experience.title: Language Tutor
info: Part-time language tutor for various international students.
Skills in language teaching, foreign language fluency, and written translation.

experience.title: Founder and Entrepreneur
info: Developed unique shampoo formulas free from harmful chemicals.
Promoted sustainability and reduced plastic waste.
Managed online sales and addressed customer inquiries.
Created content to highlight the benefits of eco-friendly hair care.

experience.title: Co-founder and Entrepreneur
info: Launched an independent venture selling homemade board games via Instagram.
Handled marketing and promotions on Instagram.
Ensured top-notch customer service and managed orders.
Handled product packaging and financial aspects of the business.
Continuously innovated based on feedback and market trends.
